    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    Author:
    Surya Ravikumar Activity that the user is greeted with. This acitivty - Displays the app title - Graphs the bot movement - Initializes widgets and sets onclicklisteners - Sets up firebase and sets data change listener - Saves path as a picture to external storage - Opens gallery activity
